title: Operations Manager-Biotech
description: As Moleculeâ€™s Biotech Operations Manager, you have a unique opportunity to shape the future success of not only Molecule, but the biotechnology industry at large. Our ecosystem of BioDAOs are constantly sourcing and evaluating inbound research proposals and early stage biotech intellectual property to fund. As Biotech Operations Manager you will have a direct role in shaping the project and intellectual property that BioDAOs, supported by Molecule, fund.
